BioData: Republican, of Heath, TX; born in Mt. Prospect, IL, October 20, 1965; education: attended the University of Notre Dame, 1987; J.D., Southern Methodist University Law School, 1989; professional: chief of Anti-Terrorism and National Security for the Eastern District of Texas, 2004-07; U.S. Attorney for the Eastern District of Texas, 2007-08; lawyer, The Ashcroft Law Firm, 2008-14, TX; religion: member, Our Lady of the Lake Catholic Church; wife: Michele Ratcliffe; children: Darby and Riley; committees: Homeland Security; Judiciary; elected to the 114th Congress on November 4, 2014.
Counties: Bowie County. Cities and Townships: DeKalb, Hooks, Leary, Maud, Nash, New Boston, Red Lick, Redwater, Texarkana, Wake Village. Camp County. Cities and Townships: Pittsburg, Rocky Mound.
